author: Tan Lee Meng J:
casename: C S Geotechnic Pte Ltd v Neocorp Innovations Pte Ltd
counsel: Chia Chor Leong and Leila Ashraf (CitiLegal LLC) for the plaintiff; Mirza Namazie, Tan Teng Muan and Wong Khai Leng (Mallal and Namazie) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Contract/Assignment/Plaintiff claiming for outstanding payments under contract with defendant/Defendant purporting to assign contractual rights and liabilities to third party/Whether valid assignment of contractual burden/Whether plaintiff consenting to assignment
Contract/Formation/Parties to contract/Whether third party or defendant was true party to contract with plaintiff

Equity/Estoppel/Estoppel by convention/Defendant allegedly giving notice to plaintiff of assignment of contract to third party/Whether plaintiff clearly and unequivocally consenting to assignment/Whether defence of estoppel applied
